title: Roman Battles
name: Roman Battles
description:
A Map by Panairjdde

Major Ancient Roman battles

properties.name: Actium (31 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOctavian defeats the fleet of Mark Antony and Cleopatra, and becomes the only ruler of Rome (31 BC)

properties.name: Adrianople (324)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOn 3 July 324, Constantine defeated Licinius

properties.name: Adrianople (378)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOn 9 August 378, Fritigern and his Goths defeated the Roman army and killed Emperor Valens, in one of the major defeats in all Roman history

properties.name: Adys (255 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddetunis, tunisiaIn early 255 BC, Atilius Regulus defeated the Carthaginians, led by Hasdrubal

properties.name: Aegates Islands (241 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddefavignanaOn 10 March 241 BC, Lutatius Catulus defeated a Carthaginian fleet led by Hanno, ending the First Punic War

properties.name: Antioch (218)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOn 8 June 218, Emperor Macrinus is defeated and deposed by Elagabalus army

properties.name: Aquae Sextiae (102 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeAix-en-ProvenceIn 102 BC, Marius defeats the Teutones

properties.name: Argentoratum (357)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddestrasbourgIn 357, Emperor Julian defeats the Alamanni of Chnodomar.

properties.name: Argentovaria (378)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddecolmar, franceIn May 378, Emperor Gratian defeated the Alamanni

properties.name: Artaxata (68 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeArtashatIn 68 BC, Lucius Lucullus defeats Tigranes

properties.name: Axona (57 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeAisne, franceIn 57 BC, Julius Caesar defeated the Belgae

properties.name: Battle of Soissons (486)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeThe Franks of Clovis I defeat the last western roman army of Syagrius

properties.name: Bibracte (58 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeMontmortIn 58 BC, Julius Caesar defeats the Helvetii

properties.name: Bovianum (305 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddebojano, italyIn 305 BC, the Romans decisively defeat Samnites

properties.name: Cannae (216 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOn 2 August 216 BC, Hannibal defeats Paullus and Varro, in one of his masterpieces

properties.name: Cape Ecnomus (256 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddelicata, italyIn 256 BC, the fleet of Atilius Regulus defeated the fleet of Hamilcar and Hanno in one of the largest naval battles in history

properties.name: Carrhae (53 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddeharran, turkeyIn 53 BC, the Parthians defeat and kill Crassus

properties.name: Chalons (273)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddereimsIn February or March 273, Emperor Aurelian defeated the army of the Gallic Empire, led by Tetricus

properties.name: Cibalae (314)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeVinkovci, croatiaOn 8 October 314, Constantine I defeated Licinius at Colonia Aurelia Cibalae

properties.name: Ctesiphon (363)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddebaghdadOn 29 May 363, Emperor Julian defeated a Sassanid army under the walls of Sassanid capital Ctesiphon. He is unable to take the city, however.

properties.name: Drepana (249 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddetrapani, italyIn 249 BC, a Carthaginian fleet defeated the Romans, led by Claudius Pulcher, attemting to block the port of Drepana

properties.name: Dyrrhachium (48 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddedurazzoOn 10 July 48 BC, Pompey defeats Julius Caesar

properties.name: Edessa (259)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddesanliurfaIn 259, King Shapur I of Persia defeated and took prisoner Emperor Valerian

properties.name: Emesa (272)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddehoms, syriaIn 272, after a battle at Immae, Emperor Aurelian defeated again Queen Zenobia, taking control of her Palmyrene Empire

properties.name: Fano (271)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddefano, italyIn January 271, after a defeat at Placentia, Emperor Aurelian defeated the Alamanni

properties.name: Frigidus (394)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeVipava, sloveniaOn 5-6 September 394, Theodosius I defeated the army of usurper Eugenius and Abogast

properties.name: Hellespont (324)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn July 324, Crispus, son of Constantine I, defeated Licinius in the naval battle of Hellespont

properties.name: Immae (272)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 272, Emperor Aurelian defeats Queen Zenobia of the Palmyrene Empire

properties.name: Lake Benacus (268)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn November 268, Claudius II defeated the Alamanni. His great victory against a larger army marks the start of the recovery from the Crisis of the Third Century.

properties.name: Lake Regillus (496 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeFirst Roman battle, won against the Etruscans by Aulus Postumius against Tarquinius Superbus. Circa 496 BC

properties.name: Lake Trasimene (217 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOn 24 June 217 BC, Hannibal defeats Gaius Flaminius

properties.name: Lake Vadimo (283 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 283 BC, the Romans defeated an Etruscan-Gaulish army

properties.name: Lake Vadimo (310 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddevasanello, italyIn 310 Bc, the Romans defeated the Etruscans

properties.name: Lautulae (315 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddeterracina, italyIn 315 BC, the Samnites defeated the Romans

properties.name: Lingones (298)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddelangres, franceIn 298, Constantius Chlorus defeated the Alamanni

properties.name: Lipari Islands (260 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 260 BC, Hannibal Gisco defeated the Roman fleet led by C. Cornelius Scipio Asina

properties.name: Lugdunum (197)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddelyon, franceOn 19 February 197, Septimius Severus defeats Clodius Albinus, and becomes the only ruler of the Roman Empire

properties.name: Magnesia (190 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeSmyrna, turkeyIn December 190 BC, Lucius Cornelius Scipio Asiaticus, Scipio Africanus, and Eumenes II of Pergamum defeat Antiochus III the Great

properties.name: Milvian Bridge 312
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeBattle between Constantine I and Maxentius, 28 October 312. Constantine wins

properties.name: Mons Seleucus (353)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddela Batie-Montsaléon, franceIn 353, Emperor Constantius II defeated usurper Magnentius in a deceisive battle

properties.name: Munda (45 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOsuna, spainOn 17 March 45 BC, Julius Caesar defeated the Optimates army led by Labienus and Pompeius

properties.name: Mursa Major (351)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeOsijek, croatiaOn 28 September 351, Emperor Constantius II defeated usurper Magnentius

properties.name: Mutina (194 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddemodena, italyIn 194 BC, a Roman army defeats a Gallic force

properties.name: Mylae (260 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddemilazzo, italyIn 260 BC, Gaius Duilius defeated the Hannibal Gisco in the first naval battle fought between Roman Republic and Carthage

properties.name: Naissus (268)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddenis, serbiaIn September 268, Emperor Gallienus defeated the Goths

properties.name: Narbonne (436)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddenarbonne, franceIn 436, Aetius defeated the Visigoths of Theodoric I

properties.name: Nicaea (193)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 193, Septimius Severus defeated his rival Pescennius Niger.

properties.name: Nola (214 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeMarcus Claudius Marcellus prevents for the third time Hannibal from taking Nola

properties.name: Panormus (251 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddepalermo, italyIn 251 BC, Caecilius Metellus defeated Hasdrubal, and kept the city of Panormus in Roman hands

properties.name: Pavia (271)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddepavia, italyIn 271, Aurelian destroyed the retreating Alamanni army.

properties.name: Pharsalus (48 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddefarsalaOn 9 August 48 BC, Julius Caesar decisively defeats Pompey

properties.name: Pistoria (62 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddepistoiaIn January 62 BC, Gaius Antonius defeats Catiline, who dies

properties.name: Placentia (271)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddepiacenza, italyIn January 271, the Alamanni defeated Aurelian in an ambush, invading Italy

properties.name: Reims (356)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddereims, franceIn 356, Caesar Julian is defeated by the Alamanni

properties.name: Resaena (243)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 243, a Roman army defeated the Sassanid amry led by Shapur I, and retook the city of Resaena

properties.name: Ruspina (46 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddemonastir, tunisiaOn 4 January 46 BC, Labienus defeated Julius Caesar

properties.name: Save (388)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeLjubljanaIn 388, Emperor Theodosius I defeated usurper Magnus Maximus

properties.name: Siege of Amida (359)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeDiyarbakir, turkeyIn 359, King Shapur II conquers the Roman city of Amida

properties.name: Siege of Massilia (49 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeMarseille, FranceIn 49 BC, Julius Caesar engaged the siege, by land and sea, of the city of Massilia, finally taking it.

properties.name: Solicinum (367)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeHeidelberg, germanyIn 367, Emperor Valentinian I defeated the Alamanni

properties.name: Tapae (101)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeadamclisiIn 101, Trajan defeats the Dacian King Decebalus

properties.name: Thapsus (46 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeRas Dimas, tunisiaOn 6 February 46 BC, Julius Caesar defeated the Optimates army, led by Metellus Scipio and Cato the younger.

properties.name: Thermopylae (191 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddetrachis, greeceIn 191 BC, Manius Acilius Glabrio defeated Antiochus III the Great

properties.name: Thyatira (366)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeAkhisar , turkeyIn 366, Emperor Valens defeated the army of usurper Procopius

properties.name: Tigranocerta (69 BC)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddesilvan, turkeyIn 69 BC, Lucius Lucullus defeats the Armenian king Tigranes the Great in front of his capital

properties.name: Trebia (218 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeHannibal defeats Tiberius Sempronius Longus in the first major battle of the Second Punic War on Italian soil

properties.name: Turin (312)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddeturin, italyIn 312, Constantine I defeated an army raised by Maxentius

properties.name: Two battles of Bedriacum (69)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddecalvatone, italyIn 69, two battles are fought near Bedriacum. In the first battle, on 14 April, Vitellius defeats Otho. In the second, fought on 24 October, Vespasian\'s general Marcus Antonius Primus defeats Vitellius.

properties.name: Tyndaris (257 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddetindARI, ITALYIn 257 BC, a Roman fleet led by Atilius Regulus defeated a Carthaginian one

properties.name: Tzirallum (313)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeKaradeniz Eregli, turkeyIn 313, Licinius defeated Maximinus

properties.name: Utica (49 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 49 BC, Scribonius Curio defeated Numidians

properties.name: Vercellae (101 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddevercelliIn 101 BC, Marius, Lutatius Catulus, and Sulla defeat the Cimbri of Boiorix

properties.name: Verona (312)
properties.description: Posted by Panairjddeverona, italyIn 312, after a first victory at Turin, Constantine I defeated again Maxentius forces at Verona

properties.name: Vesuvius (339 BC)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeIn 339 BC, the Romans defeated the Latins

properties.name: Vindonissa (298)
properties.description: Posted by PanairjddeWindischIn 298, after the battle of Lingones, Constantius Chlorus defeated again the Alamanni
